name: Sonic Skylight Island
description:
Sonic Skylight Island

Date: February 16th 2020

It Take Place Between S3&K And Chaotix.

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Enter To Change Character

Story/Plot

After The Event Of Sonic 3 & Knuckles And Before The Event Of Knuckles Chaotix.

Dr.Robotnik Build A Land Called Skylight Island And Build A Wall To Block Sonic And Tails.

On The Next Day, Amy Rose Want To Ask Sonic To Go On An Adventure With Him And Tails And Sonic Said Yes!

Amy Rose Finally Joined Sonic And Tails On Their Adventure.

Now It Only A Trio With Sonic, Tails, And Amy.

When On Angel Island, Knuckles See A New Island That Close To Him.

He Fly To Sonic And Tails And Warn Them About Dr.Robotnik New Building To Take Over World As A Whole.

Tails Add Sonic, Amy And Knuckles On His Tornado.

Knuckles Break Dr.Robotnik Wall And They Finally Entered Into Skylight Island.

It Up To Sonic, Tails, Knuckles And Amy To Stop Dr.Robotnik And Destroy Skylight Island.
